Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • suncertify.Utils

  • public class Utils
extends java.lang.Object
    A set of utility methods for use by all classes.
    Author:
    Nick Shrine

      • subtractHours

        public static java.util.Date subtractHours(java.util.Date date,
                                           int hours)
        Returns a Date object that is earlier than the given Date by the given number of hours.
        Parameters:
        date - the date to subtract hours from.
        hours - the number of hours to substract from the date.
        Returns:
        the date that is the specified number of hours before the given date.
